title: Language Learning Design Integrating Cognitive Technologies: Mobile Microlearning Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level expertise in specialized fields (medical/legal/technical) and basic digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Aims to improve practical language skills contextualized within social frameworks for professional adult learners, with comprehensive analysis of learning outcomes via project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners improve listening and speaking proficiency in their specialized field by 20% using speech-to-text conversion technology
Learners enhance situational reading comprehension accuracy by 15% by applying image-to-text recognition technology
Learners develop at least three language-use scenarios tailored to real-world work environments using location-based recognition technology
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
